short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables the management of cryptographic devices (smartcards and/or tokens) for European System of Central Banks PKIâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enables the management of cryptographic devices (smartcards and/or tokens) for European System of Central Banks PKI users. Some of the operations included are: key generation, certificate and key storage, certificate and key removal, change user PIN.

Requires the base software ESCBPKIuserCertEnrollment, available at http://pki.escb.eu/epkweb/en/support.html.
